meanings.sent1: The leaf was papillose, with tiny bumps all over.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar's skin was papillose, feeling rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The papillose surface of the cake made it look like a miniature mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement created a papillose texture in the air, full of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The papillose texture of the fabric reminded her of a field of tiny mushrooms.
